description: System-generated unique identifier for this vendor-role record associated with a part. Serves as the primary key for joins and reference.
Date-time the row was created or last updated, encoded as yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm. Supports auditing, synchronization, and change tracking.
Boolean flag indicating the vendor is the main supplier for the part; false implies a secondary role.
Categorizes the vendorâ€™s role for a part, such as main or secondary supplier. Used to drive sourcing and procurement rules.
Identifier of the corresponding record in a legacy system; used for data migration mapping and traceability.
Name of the source table in the legacy system that held the original record; likely for migration lineage tracking; confirm with SME.
